channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose slabs, 9th December
item.description:
Outside 39 Old Farm Ave there a couple of loose slabs that both my wife and I have almost tripped over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple bags of dog excrement, 9th December
item.description:
There are unfortunately four or five bags of dog waste dumped along the alley in this location, especially at the crossroads of the two alleys as you arrive down from Lennard Rd, and they have been thrown in the public flowerbeds/amongst fallen leaves too. Both green and black bags.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victor Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip of kitchen doors and black bags near number 26 Becket House., 9th December
item.description:
This fly tip has been here since Monday 1st December.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilgrimage Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small flytip by green telecoms box, 9th December
item.description:
Bag of domestic rubbish, a small mat and what looks like a plastic litter tray have been dumped next to and behind the telecoms box in the pedestrianised bit between Lennard Rd and Hardings lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hardings Lane, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Chair Dumped on Pavement, 9th December
item.description:
A broken chair has been left dumped on the pavement outside number 31. Can the local team please remove it. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Waverley Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 9th December
item.description:
There is a pothole which has been growing in size since October. See attached photos from 14th October and today, 9th December.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Margaret's Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin needs emptying, 9th December
item.description:
This bin by Fairford academy consistently forgets to be emptied. It is overflowing on the floor. The foxes then pick it up and dump it in my front garden

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairford Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Concrete Dumped on Pavement, 9th December
item.description:
Several large pieces of waste concrete have been left dumped on the pavement. Can the local team please remove them. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Villas Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several uneven paving slabs, 9th December
item.description:
There are several uneven paving slabs together in this location, causing trip hazard. It is right in the middle of a narrow strip of pavement behind the bus stop. The depression in the pavement appears to be getting worse. The paviors need relaying. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, High Street, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Medium size Pothole increasing catching wheels, 9th December
item.description:
Medium size Pothole increasing by the day unavoidably catching wheels as street is narrow and cars are parked on the side. This is nearby 55 Neale Close, just a metre away from drain after the curve. Please fix. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Neale Close, Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parked illegally, 9th December
item.description:
Your Limes bikes continue to fill pay and display only bays and also CA-H resident only parking bay. Now overflowing to the double yellow lines making it very difficult for emergency vehicles in their way to the Royal Free Hospital. This is not acceptable. Please collect them all

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Church Row, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven Paving Stone and Trip Hazard, 9th December
item.description:
There is an uneven paving stone directly outside the steps of Woolwich Arsenal Station, which is a trip hazard for anyone with mobility issues. Can it please be re-fitted. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich New Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty sign, 9th December
item.description:
This sign is grubby and is in a prime tourist location: can someone clean it? It doesn’t shout “Don’t l proud of where I live” and it should

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen Victoria Street, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Soiled nappies on Olinda Road, 9th December
item.description:
Cardboard box containing soiled nappies & other detritus dumped outside my property, appeared overnight & noticed today Dec 9th. This is not the first time & it is completely unacceptable

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stamford Hill, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pile of Rubbish Dumped on Pavement, 9th December
item.description:
A pile of rubbish has been left dumped on the pavement. Can the local team please clear it away. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Vincent Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Using cones to block the road to save parking space, 9th December
item.description:
Using incident cones to reserve parking outside of their house

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Edmonton, Enfield, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned car AV11SYY white Nissan, 9th December
item.description:
This car has been her for months 3-4 can’t locate an owner in our block. Unregistered and untaxed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Unwanted Mattresses and Furniture Dumped on Path, 9th December
item.description:
